hypothesis_content.title: Post-Holiday Volatility Expansion in Memecoins
hypothesis_content.statement: Following 3+ consecutive low-volatility trading days (average true range < 50% of 20-day ATR) in memecoins (DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP) during NEUTRAL regimes, the first day with BTC price movement >±3% will trigger outsized volatility expansion (>12% daily move) in memecoins, with directional bias following BTC's move.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Memecoins exhibit high beta to BTC during volatility expansions after calm periods. Low liquidity during low-volatility phases leads to exaggerated moves when market-wide volatility returns, as leveraged positions are quickly established.
entry_conditions: DOGE/PEPE/TRUMP average 3-day ATR < 50% of their 20-day ATR
Enter directional position in memecoins aligned with BTC direction at open following BTC move

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Memecoin moves opposite to BTC direction by >5%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC volatility fails to transmit to memecoins (memecoin moves <6%) in >40% of occurrences, or correlation breaks down.
